message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I think it will be a great asset to you, even at a premium.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $8,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to that amount?
Bob, I understand your position, but $8,000 is significantly below its value. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value of the product, I am still aiming to stay within my budget. Could we possibly discuss a price closer to $9,000?
